md:
giải nghĩa từ "guod" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

```
guod /ɡuɔt/ (noun) 
- Meaning: country, nation, state
- Example sentence: "Vietnam is a beautiful guod."
- Related words: guodmen (citizen), guodly (national), guodship (nationality)

guod /ɡuɔt/ (verb) 
- Meaning: to govern, to rule
- Example sentence: "The king guod the country with wisdom."
- Related words: guodment (government), guodder (ruler), guodship (governance)

guod /ɡuɔt/ (adjective) 
- Meaning: national, public
- Example sentence: "The guod library is open to everyone."
- Related words: guodly (publicly), guodness (nationality), guodwide (nationally)
```

Note: The pronunciation /ɡuɔt/ is an approximation, as the actual pronunciation may vary depending on the language and dialect.

In this example, the word "guod" has three different meanings and uses, each with its own set of related words and example sentences. The meanings and uses are categorized by part of speech (noun, verb, adjective), and the example sentences demonstrate how the word can be used in context.

guod /ɡuɔt/ (adjective) - Meaning: national, public - Example sentence: "The guod library is open to everyone." - Related words: guodly (publicly), guodness (nationality), guodwide (nationally) ```
